title: A basic town
template: The town of {^town_name}, located in  {^place_adjective} {^biome}, is mostly populated by {race_plural}, who are ruled by the {^nation_type} of {^nation_name}.

title: Beware, traveller!
template: In the {^nation_type} of {^nation_name}, travelers avoid the {^place_adjective} {^biome}, rumored to be cursed.

title: Founder
template: Legends say {town_name} was founded by a lone {race_singular} warrior in the heart of the {^place_adjective} {^biome}.

title: Founder 2
template: Legends say {town_name} was founded by a lone {race_singular} warrior named {^human_{gender}_name} in the heart of the {^place_adjective} {^biome}.
